name: Sunless Letter
description:
Follow the trace of your lost love in space. Track down letters she left behind to find her back. Unravel the mystery around your home planet.

Sunless Letter is a fast paced platformer in a low gravity environment with deep mechanics.

  • Run, jump, dash and bounce to find your way while avoiding mortal asteroids.
  • Enjoy astonishing landscapes and a original musics
  • Speedrun friendly ✔️

(WIP : only level 1 is playable)

Concept Art and Illustration by Marie Charbonnier

Programming, graphics, musics, animations by Andrea Michel

Github link : https://github.com/ilyord/Plateformer_Perso
